about_the_game:
One rainy day you come home from the store and find a wounded fox on the road. In spite of your strict parents who forbid you to have pets, you decide to take her in.

Can you take good care of her if you don't even know what foxes eat?

CONTENT WARNING

This visual novel deals with mature themes and may not be appropriate for those who are easily disturbed.

Never Trust a Fox — is a mystical thriller visual novel.

Features

  • A mystic thriller/horror story
  • You can pet a cute foxgirl!
  • Choices-driven branching narrative
  • Secret discovery journal

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or considered NSFW.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Never Trust a Fox

  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
